title: What I Know For Sure: Awe & Clarity
description: Oprah shares excerpts from her New York Times Best-Selling book, What I Know For Sure. Inspired by her widely popular O, The Oprah Magazine's column, the compilation book includes Oprah's insight on how to become your best self. Filled with personal Aha moments and the life-changing lesson she learned from a near-death experience, Oprah shares the importance of finding awe and clarity within your own life.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
